gist.headline: Updating the Daily Hive
gist.blurb: Just a quick update to the news printing press.
gist.summary: Updated the highlights markdown file in the social media pipeline to reflect recent model changes.
gist.impact: Ensures the automated news system broadcasts the correct announcements.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee as a newspaper editor adjusting a layout. Represents the internal update to the news system.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a cute bee character adjusting a retro newspaper layout on a desk. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Text in pixel font: 'NEWS'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny bee character updating a pixelated digital news board. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting. Lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.
